events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, detailing the accident circumstances and requesting claim initiation.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the collision involving the insured car.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case, ensuring dedicated support for the customer throughout the process.
The customer was contacted promptly to acknowledge receipt of their claim and provide initial information about the next steps.
Request was sent to the customer asking for the accident report, photos of vehicle damage, and police documentation for verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos of the damaged vehicle and the official police accident report.
The investigation team began a thorough review of the accident circumstances, verifying the submitted evidence and claim validity.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of claim legitimacy and assessment of repair costs required for the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer was drafted and sent to the customer outlining compensation for the auto repairs and related expenses.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing satisfaction with the proposed terms and clarity of communication.
Formal approval was granted for the claim to proceed to payment based on the agreed settlement between parties.
The settlement payment for vehicle repairs was successfully processed and sent to the customerâ€™s designated account.
The claim was formally closed after confirming receipt of payment and addressing all customer questions and concerns.
All claim files and related documents were securely archived for future reference and compliance with company policies.
